RelatedSentence: The trial of a 29 - year - old California man authorities say shot at two vehicles in southwestern Idaho has been delayed .
The Sacramento man 's trial has been pushed back to July 14 to allow the defense time to examine documents recently turned over by prosecutors .

The Idaho Statesman reports charges directly related to the shootings could be filed later in state court .
